alert.note: Alert for Fleming; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of northeastern Fleming and northeastern Rowan Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 913 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower capable of producing a cold air funnel over Wallingford, or 8 miles east of Flemingsburg, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Cold air funnel and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Muses Mills around 925 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Waltz, Triplett, Cranston and Haldeman. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. This type of funnel cloud is harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
